data.description: Make a test.t demo.d STD.pm from a form db
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Part of a 2167A bundle that automatically generates test script,
    demo script and documentation module from a forms data base file.
    The doucmetation module is in accordance with a tailored 2167A STD
    DID

    Test::TestUtil Test::Tech DataPort::DataFile
    DataPort::FileType::FormDB Test::STDmaker ExtUtils::SVDmaker
